name: Final Ball World
description:
Innovative game with exceptional gameplay. Gyro sensor control integrated. Outstanding movement control - tilt the entire world.
6 Tutorials make understanding the game easy.
36 handmade levels let you test your skills!
Play against the time in 3 brand new levels!
Wonderful sound experience - the hand selected music absorbs you into this sphere of fun and agility. Get ready for the final ball challenge!
